title: FOX AWL fork is a stiffer 34mm stanchion fork with all the mounts for eMTBs and e-SUVs
content:
The FOX AWL (Adventure Without Limits) is a new 34mm stanchion fork optimized for the weighty demands of short travel eMTBs and e-SUVs. The AWL is said to be much stiffer than the FOX 34, bearing a striking resemblance to the Marzocchi Bomber Z2. Approved for a maximum system weight limit of 169 kg, the

The post FOX AWL fork is a stiffer 34mm stanchion fork with all the mounts for eMTBs and e-SUVs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
